opportunities.title: Civil Engineer for Cost Estimation
opportunities.proposal:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am excited to apply for your Civil Engineer Cost Estimation project.

With 10+ years of experience as a Quantity Surveyor in the UAE and 300+ completed projects, I specialize in:

✓ Detailed cost estimation
✓ BOQ preparation
✓ Quantity takeoff from drawings
✓ Dubai Municipality approved (G+4)

I am proficient in AutoCAD, Bluebeam, and Excel, ensuring accurate and professional deliverables.

I am available to start immediately and committed to delivering precise work within your timeline.

Looking forward to discussing your project.

Best regards,
Eng. Basel Omar
Quantity Surveyor | UAE

opportunities.title: Quantity Takeoff & Cost Estimate for Residential
opportunities.proposal:
Dear Client,

I am very interested in your Quantity Takeoff & Cost Estimate project.

As a Quantity Surveyor with extensive experience in residential projects, I can provide:

✓ Accurate quantity takeoff from your drawings
✓ Detailed BOQ with market-rate pricing
✓ Cost estimation based on UAE market rates
✓ Professional Excel/PDF deliverables

My track record includes 300+ projects and Dubai Municipality approval (G+4).

For your $50 budget, I will deliver a complete and accurate quantity takeoff with cost estimate.

Ready to start immediately.

Best regards,
Eng. Basel Omar

opportunities.title: Remote Estimator for Construction Company
opportunities.proposal:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the Remote Estimator position.

With over 10 years in the construction industry and 300+ completed estimation projects, I offer:

✓ Expert quantity surveying and cost estimation
✓ Proficiency in AutoCAD, Bluebeam, PlanSwift
✓ Strong understanding of construction methods and materials
✓ Excellent communication and remote work capabilities

I am Dubai Municipality approved and have worked on residential, commercial, and infrastructure projects throughout the UAE.

I am seeking a long-term collaboration and am flexible with working hours.

Looking forward to contributing to your team.

Best regards,
Eng. Basel Omar

opportunities.title: Interior Drawings & Quantity Survey
opportunities.proposal:
Dear Client,

I am interested in your Interior Drawings & Quantity Survey project.

My expertise includes:

✓ Interior fit-out quantity surveying
✓ Detailed BOQ for all interior works
✓ Accurate measurements and specifications
✓ Cost estimation with UAE market rates

I have completed numerous interior projects including offices, retail spaces, and residential units.

For your budget range of $250-750, I can provide comprehensive quantity surveying services including BOQ, cost estimation, and documentation.

Available to discuss your specific requirements.

Best regards,
Eng. Basel Omar
Quantity Surveyor | 10+ Years Experience
